ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

error.invalid: The email you entered is not valid

404.title: Error
404.message: The email you entered is not registered

200.title: Success
200.message: A reset link has been sent to your email

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later
